verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Let's go up to ZIon (3x)
The city of our God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing Hallelujah (3x)
There's joy in the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's oil and wine in Zion (3x)
The city of our God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There is a King in Zion (3x)
The city of our God

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We'll worship Him in Zion (3x)
The city of our God
